00124 int cache_content_init( cache_content_client_parameter_t param, cache_content_status_t *pstatus )
00125 {
00126   /* Try to create the cache directory */
00127   if( mkdir( param.cache_dir, 0750 ) != 0 && errno != EEXIST )
00128     {
00129       /* Cannot create the directory for caching data */
00130       fprintf( stderr, "Can't create cache dir = %s, error = ( %d, %s )\n", 
00131                param.cache_dir, errno, strerror( errno ) ) ;
00132 
00133       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00134       return -1 ;
00135     }
00136   
00137 
00138   /* Successfull exit */
00139   return 0 ;
00140 } /* cache_content_init */
00141 
00152 int cache_content_init_dir( cache_content_client_parameter_t param, unsigned short export_id )
00153 {
00154   char path_to_dir[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00155   
00156   snprintf( path_to_dir, MAXPATHLEN, "%s/export_id=%d", param.cache_dir, 0 ) ;
00157   
00158   if( mkdir( path_to_dir, 0750 ) != 0 && errno != EEXIST )
00159     {
00160       return -1 ;
00161     }
00162 
00163   return 0 ;
00164 } /* cache_content_init_dir */
00165 
00178 int cache_content_client_init( cache_content_client_t           * pclient,
00179                                cache_content_client_parameter_t   param )
00180 {
00181   LRU_status_t lru_status ;
00182 
00183   pclient->log_outputs         = param.log_outputs ;
00184   pclient->nb_prealloc         = param.nb_prealloc_entry ;
00185   pclient->flush_force_fsal    = param.flush_force_fsal ;
00186   pclient->max_fd_per_thread   = param.max_fd_per_thread ;
00187   pclient->retention           = param.retention ;
00188   pclient->use_cache           = param.use_cache ;
00189   strncpy( pclient->cache_dir, param.cache_dir, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00190 
00191 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00192   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00193   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_content_entry_t" ) ;
00194 #endif
00195 
00196 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00197   STUFF_PREALLOC( pclient->pool_entry,
00198                   pclient->nb_prealloc,
00199                   cache_content_entry_t,
00200                   next_alloc ) ;
00201 
00202 # ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00203     /* For debugging memory leaks */
00204     BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00205 # endif
00206 
00207   if( pclient->pool_entry == NULL )
00208     {
00209       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init data_cache client entry pool" ) ;
00210       return 1 ;
00211     }
00212 #endif
00213 
00214   /* Successfull exit */
00215   return 0 ;
00216 } /* cache_content_init */
